channel.title: Tsung on The Art of PostgreSQL
channel.description: Recent content in Tsung on The Art of PostgreSQL

item.title: See Tsung in action
item.description: Tsung is an open-source multi-protocol distributed load testing tool and a mature project. It’s been available for about 10 years and is built with the Erlang system. It supports several protocols, including the PostgreSQL one. When you want to benchmark your own application, to know how many more clients it can handle or how much gain you will see with some new shiny hardware, Tsung is the tool to use. It will allow you to record a number of sessions then replay them at high scale.
